titleInfo.title: Act to Provide for the Support of the Families of Officers, Soldiers and Marines, Non-commissioned Officers

mods.note: General Note: No collective title. General Note: Signed: Adolphus Olivier, Henry M. Hyams, Thomas O. Moore. General Note: Approved January 3rd, 1863. General Note: Each title preceded by number of act: No. 41; No. 21; No. 42, respectively.
